entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
